description: Black tactical work belt with MOLLE webbing for pouches and holster support

core:description.text: A heavy-duty black tactical work belt designed for professional use in demanding environments. Features reinforced nylon webbing construction with MOLLE-compatible attachment points for modular pouches, holsters, and equipment. The quick-release buckle provides rapid donning and doffing while the rigid inner support belt ensures stability under heavy loads. Built to military specifications for reliability in field operations, law enforcement, or outdoor work.
